snippet.title: Motördoom Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
🚨 Demo Alert 🚨
Get ready to experience the ultimate combination of freestyle-sports, roguelite and horde shooter with Motördoom! In this high octane game, you will battle grotesque monsters while performing gnarly tricks and upgrading your character with demonic offerings to become even more powerful.

Earn experience points by combining trick combos with kills, and choose one of three random Demonic Offerings to enhance your power. Build your own deck of cards and unlock new ones for later runs.

Ride your chainsaw driven pit bike through the monster-filled arena, perform flips, grabs, grinds, and manuals, and create the sickest combo ever seen in the underworld. With different characters and bikes to choose from, find your own style and do the tricks you want.

Download the demo now and join the action-packed journey to defeat the ever-growing horde of grotesque monsters!

🎮Steam: http://steam.pm/app/1894720
🕹Discord: http://discord.gg/SP8DMEH3ES
🐦Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoboCatGames
